entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
